people.name: Joseph J. Katz
people.description: Joseph J.  Katz  was a chemist at Argonne National Laboratory whose fundamental research on the chemistry of photosynthesis led to his election to the US National Academy of Science.

people.name: George B. Pegram
people.description: George Braxton Pegram  was an American physicist who played a key role in the technical administration of the Manhattan Project.

people.name: Girish Karnad
people.description: Girish Raghunath Karnad  is an Indian actor, film director, writer playwright and a Rhodes Scholar, who predominantly works in South Indian cinema.

people.name: Thornton Wilder
people.description: Thornton Niven Wilder  was an American playwright and novelist.

people.name: Lise Meitner
people.description: Lise Meitner  was an Austrian physicist who worked on radioactivity and nuclear physics.

people.name: Niels Bohr
people.description: Niels Henrik David Bohr  was a Danish physicist who made foundational contributions to understanding atomic structure and quantum theory, for which he received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1922.

people.name: Jan Tinbergen
people.description: Jan Tinbergen  was a Dutch economist.  He was awarded the first Bank of Sweden Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel in 1969, which he shared with Ragnar Frisch for having developed and applied dynamic models for the analysis of economic processes.

people.name: Murray Gell-Mann
people.description: Murray Gell-Mann  is an American physicist who received the 1969 Nobel Prize in physics for his work on the theory of elementary particles.

people.name: Jerome Isaac Friedman
people.description: Jerome Isaac Friedman  is an American physicist.  He is Institute Professor and Professor of Physics, Emeritus, at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

people.name: Physicist
people.description: A physicist is a scientist who has specialized knowledge in the field of physics, the exploration of the interactions of matter and energy across the physical universe.

people.name: Wang Ganchang
people.description: Wang Ganchang   was a Chinese nuclear physicist.  He was one of the founding fathers of Chinese nuclear physics, cosmic rays and particle physics.

people.name: Frederick Reines
people.description: Frederick Reines ;  was an American physicist.  He was awarded the 1995 Nobel Prize in Physics for his co-detection of the neutrino with Clyde Cowan in the neutrino experiment.
